Modification_Detail.description: extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model

Volume_PDS3.archive_status_note: The database contains a value of NULL. For the purposes of this exercise, the value was replaced with IN_QUEUE
Volume_PDS3.description:
CERTIFIED This volume contains all Cassini Orbiter Magnetospheric Imaging Instrument (MIMI) uncalibrated data. Version 0003 data are not eligible for use in the 2012 ROSES CDAPS.
Included in this volume are LEMMS, CHEMS, and INCA data at Saturn: covering the interval 2004-013 (13 Jan) to 2012-366 (31 Dec). Calibration, and geometry data and documents key to the understanding and use of the data on this volume are located on the Cassini MIMI Uncalibrated Data Archive: Reference Volume (COMIMI_0000).
Note that errors were found in the Priority Channel information contained in some of the LEMMS Accumulation Rate (LACC) and LEMMS Fine Accumulation Rate (LFRT) data for 2009. As of 07 Oct 2010 the affected files have been removed and replaced with new versions which have a PRODUCT_VERSION_ID of '0001'. For more information please refer to the LEMMS data set catalog file (CO_MIMI_LEMMS_DS.CAT).
Note that errors have been found in some of the the Inca Image (IIMG0) version 0002 data.
In general, version 0002 files are known to have cosmetic errors, the data itself is fine. Some fields have extra quotes around them. All numeric values are correct.
Version 0002 data files are being replaced by version 0003 as they become available.
Use this data with caution.
